"What Can Be Done For Now":
"Have you heard?　You know, about the ruins they found
ahead of the Naberian White Summit.
I've just received an investigation request regarding
increasing D-arkers, how about traveling with me?
It's safer to do this as a pair as opposed to doing it alone right?　
That's right, you and me!

*Clear on S rank on Very Hard or higher
traveling only with Echo"

"きみも聞いた？　ナベリウスの凍土の先で
見つかった、遺跡の話。
ちょっと今、ダーカー増加についての
調査依頼が来てるんだけど、よかったら
あたしと一緒に行かない？
ほ、ほら、単独行動より二人の方が
安全でしょ？　きみも、あたしも！

※エコーのみ同行、
ベリーハード以上Ｓランククリア"
